localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: You've been working on your project for months. You finally finished the product and now you need a name. You're exhausted from brainstorming and struggling to find a good domain. That's why we sell brandable domains with logos ready to go!
blogPost.body: You've been working on your project for months. You finally finished the product and now you need a name. You're exhausted from brainstorming and struggling to find a good domain. That's why we sell brandable domains with logos ready to go!
blogPost.title: IndieBrands - Original domain names and logos for your startup
blogPost.author: Laurids

localize.description: 你已经在你的项目上工作了几个月。你终于完成了产品，现在你需要一个名字。你从头脑风暴中筋疲力尽，努力寻找一个好的域名。这就是为什么我们出售带有标识的品牌域名，随时可以使用!
localize.tagline: 为您的初创企业提供原创域名和标识。

localize.description: 你已經在你的項目上工作了幾個月。你終於完成了產品，現在你需要一個名字。你從頭腦風暴中筋疲力盡，努力尋找一個好的域名。這就是爲什麼我們出售帶有標識的品牌域名，隨時可以使用!
localize.tagline: 爲您的初創企業提供原創域名和標識。

previous.title: I wonder how many Pelotons are stuck on that ship

localize.full_text: 我不知道有多少Pelotons被困在那艘船上了
我不知道有多少Pelotons被困在那艘船上了

next.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
next.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money

localize.description: Showwcase是一个为开发者构建和优化的社交网络。开发者可以连接， 与志同道合的人分享他们的知识和展示他们的项目。对于开发者内容创造者来说，你可以通过付费用户赚钱。
localize.tagline: 一个让你赚钱的开发者社交网络。

localize.description: Showwcase是一個爲開發者構建和優化的社交網絡。開發者可以連接， 與志同道合的人分享他們的知識和展示他們的項目。對於開發者內容創造者來說，你可以通過付費用戶賺錢。
localize.tagline: 一個讓你賺錢的開發者社交網絡。
